title: Kurt Vonnegut - God Bless You, Mr. Rosewater
description:

 Encoder..........: LAME 3.98         
 Encoder Settings.: ABR 80 kbit/s 22050 Hz Mono          
 ID3 Tags.........: v1.1, v2.3 (includes embedded album art)

Book Description
================

Eliot Rosewater, a drunk volunteer fireman and president of the fabulously rich Rosewater Foundation, is about to attempt a noble experiment with human nature, with a little help from writer Kilgore Trout. The result is Kurt Vonnegut&#039;s funniest satire, an etched-in-acid portrayal of the greed, hypocrisy, and follies of the flesh we are all heir to.
